title: Isotonic Calibration Schema
description: Schema for isotonic calibration data used to calibrate model predictions

brier.description: Brier score of the calibration (lower is better)

n_pos.description: Number of positive samples used for calibration

label.description: Name of the label this calibration is for

date_created.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the calibration was created

model_version.description: Version of the model this calibration is for

allOf.description: x and y arrays must be of equal length

x.$comment: This is validated by the custom validator for monotonicity

y.$comment: This is validated by the custom validator for monotonicity
